title: Day 1088
content:
# Day 1088

Today I spent the evening cooking and hanging with my Grandparents who don't live in the same town as me. Man do I love getting to see them. It's so special getting to spend time with my family. It goes by so fast and it feels surreal to watch my Daughter traverse the same hill in my Grandparents front yard that I used to when I was about that age.

Right after writing that I decided to send my Daughter an email. She is two so I maintain the account for her until she is old enough to use it herself and when I went to check on it and make sure all is well I saw this.

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*HZlCanFzQH2FNklw6Vxddw.png)

Now you might be thinking ok and? Well I will tell you what. This dude on X had one of the wildest calls I've ever seen during my time in Bitcoin.

![[https://x.com/JoshMandell6/status/1853996247549366548](https://x.com/JoshMandell6/status/1853996247549366548)](https://miro.medium.com/1*M_Q56m4Af9pKLT9-Qemaxg.png)

This was where Bitcoin ended up today at the close (UTC time):

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*JFWsclaKz0SCd_1IxR7TaA.png)

Bitcoin Bitcoin Bitcoin.

It's funny how the universe is always making these little anomlies. I am so bullish on life. It's a bright orange future anon. Enjoy it!

3/14/25

Conor Jay Chepenik
